グローバル変数
```{r}
test_type <- "FISHER"
cutoff <- 0.05
hsapiens <- 9606
mmuculus <- 10090
# BP <- "GO:0008150"
BP <- "ANNOT_TYPE_ID_PANTHER_GO_SLIM_BP"
header = "number_in_list\tfold_enrichment\tfdr\texpected \tnumber_in_reference\tpValue\tplus_minus\tterm.id\tterm.label"
types <- c("shared", "Hs_only") # + , "No_homology_info"
output_directory <- "PANTHER/GO_4condition"
```
GO解析
```{r}
go_analysis <- function(marker.genes, taxon.id, cutoff = 0.05, outfile = "outfile.txt",
                        ref_genes = NULL, ref_organism = NULL){
 if(length(marker.genes) > 0){
    rba_panther_enrich(marker.genes, taxon.id, BP, test_type = test_type,
                       cutoff = cutoff, ref_genes = ref_genes, ref_organism = ref_organism) -> marker.result
    write.table(marker.result$result, file = outfile,
                quote = F, row.names = F, sep="\t")
  }else{
    header %>%
      write(file = outfile)
  }
}
```

一回分
```{r}
input <- "Liver"
cluster_id <- 0
go_4condition <- function(organ, cluster_id){
  # 特定の細胞クラスターの全CCS遺伝子
  hs_marker %>%
      filter(organ == input & cluster == cluster_id & !is.na(Gene_stable_ID)) %>%
      dplyr::select(Gene_stable_ID) %>%
      distinct %>%
      unlist -> ccs_gene
  # 特定の細胞クラスターのHS_SSのCCS遺伝子
  hs_marker %>%
      filter(organ == input & cluster == cluster_id & !is.na(Gene_stable_ID) & Homology_type == "Hs_SS") %>%
      dplyr::select(Gene_stable_ID) %>%
      distinct %>%
      unlist -> ccs_gene.hs_ss
  # 特定の細胞クラスターのヒト特異的なCCS遺伝子
  hs_marker %>%
      filter(organ == input & cluster == cluster_id & !is.na(Gene_stable_ID) & share == "Hs_only") %>%
      dplyr::select(Gene_stable_ID) %>%
      distinct %>%
      unlist -> ccs_gene.hs_only
  # 特定の細胞クラスターのヒト-マウス共通なCCS遺伝子
  hs_marker %>%
      filter(organ == input & cluster == cluster_id & !is.na(Gene_stable_ID) & share == "shared") %>%
      dplyr::select(Gene_stable_ID) %>%
      distinct %>%
      unlist -> ccs_gene.share

  # 1. その細胞種全体に濃縮された遺伝子機能
  # Outfile
  paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_all_gene_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
    paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") -> outfile 
  # GO analysis
  go_analysis(ccs_gene, hsapiens, cutoff = cutoff, outfile = outfile)
  Sys.sleep(1)
  
  # 2. ヒトSS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
  # Outfile
  paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_Hs_SS_gene_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
    paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") -> outfile 
  # GO analysis
  go_analysis(ccs_gene.hs_ss, hsapiens, cutoff = cutoff, outfile = outfile)
  Sys.sleep(1)
  
  # 3. 細胞種マーカー遺伝子中のヒトSS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
  # Outfile
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_Hs_SS_gene_of_CCS_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
      paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") -> outfile 
  if(length(ccs_gene) > 0){
    # GO analysis
    go_analysis(ccs_gene.hs_ss, hsapiens, cutoff = cutoff, outfile = outfile,
                ref_genes = ccs_gene, ref_organism = hsapiens)
    Sys.sleep(1)
  }else{
    header %>%
      write(file = outfile)
  }
  
  # 5. その細胞種全体に濃縮された遺伝子機能について、ヒトCCS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
  paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_Hs_only_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
    paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") -> outfile 
  # GO analysis
  go_analysis(ccs_gene.hs_only, hsapiens, cutoff = cutoff, outfile = outfile)
  Sys.sleep(1)
  # 6. その細胞種のCCS遺伝子のうち、ヒトCCS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
  # Outfile
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_Hs_only_gene_of_CCS_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
      paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") -> outfile 
  if(length(ccs_gene) > 0){
    # GO analysis
    go_analysis(ccs_gene.hs_only, hsapiens, cutoff = cutoff, outfile = outfile,
                ref_genes = ccs_gene, ref_organism = hsapiens)
    Sys.sleep(1)
  }else{
    header %>%
      write(file = outfile)
  }
  # 7. その細胞種全体に濃縮された遺伝子機能について、ヒト-マウス共有CCS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
  paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_shared_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
    paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") -> outfile 
  # GO analysis
  go_analysis(ccs_gene.share, hsapiens, cutoff = cutoff, outfile = outfile)
  Sys.sleep(1)
}
go_4condition(input, cluster_id)
```

GO解析の結果を取得してまとめる
```{r}
go_result_table <- tibble()
for(input in well_integrated){
  print(input)
  hs_marker %>%
      filter(organ == input) %>%
      dplyr::select(cluster) %>%
      distinct() %>%
      unlist -> Hs_all
  for(cluster_id in Hs_all){
    # 1. CCS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
    # Outfile
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_all_gene_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
        paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") %>%
        read_tsv(show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
        mutate(organ = input, cluster = cluster_id,
               type = "ccs", background = "all") %>%
        rbind(go_result_table, .) -> go_result_table
      
    # 2. ヒトSS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
    # Outfile
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_Hs_SS_gene_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
        paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") %>%
        read_tsv(show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
        mutate(organ = input, cluster = cluster_id,
               type = "ccs_ss", background = "all") %>%
        rbind(go_result_table, .) -> go_result_table
    
    # 3. 細胞種マーカー遺伝子中のヒトSS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
    # Outfile
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_Hs_SS_gene_of_CCS_version2.tsv",
          sep = "") %>%
        paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") %>%
        read_tsv(show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
        mutate(organ = input, cluster = cluster_id,
               type = "ccs_ss", background = "ccs") %>%
        rbind(go_result_table, .) -> go_result_table
    
    # 5. その細胞種全体に濃縮された遺伝子機能について、ヒトCCS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_Hs_only_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
        paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") %>%
        read_tsv(show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
        mutate(organ = input, cluster = cluster_id,
               type = "ccs_hs_only", background = "all") %>%
        rbind(go_result_table, .) -> go_result_table
    # 6. その細胞種のCCS遺伝子のうち、ヒトCCS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
    # Outfile
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_Hs_only_gene_of_CCS_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
      paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") %>%
      read_tsv(show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
      mutate(organ = input, cluster = cluster_id,
             type = "ccs_hs_only", background = "css") %>%
      rbind(go_result_table, .) -> go_result_table
    # 7. その細胞種全体に濃縮された遺伝子機能について、ヒト-マウス共有CCS遺伝子に濃縮された遺伝子機能
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_shared_version2.tsv", sep = "") %>%
      paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") %>%
      read_tsv(show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
      mutate(organ = input, cluster = cluster_id,
             type = "ccs_shared", background = "all") %>%
      rbind(go_result_table, .) -> go_result_table
  }
}
```

GO解析の結果を上からプロット
```{r}
for(input in well_integrated){
  print(input)
  hs_marker %>%
      filter(organ == input) %>%
      dplyr::select(cluster) %>%
      distinct() %>%
      unlist -> Hs_all
  for(cluster_id in Hs_all){
    go_result_table %>%
      mutate(cluster = factor(cluster)) %>%
      inner_join(cell_type_ontology, by = c("organ", "cluster")) %>%
      filter(background == "all" & organ == input & cluster == cluster_id) %>%
      mutate(log_fdr = -log10(fdr)) %>%
      mutate(GO_short = cut_GO_short(term.id, term.label, 40)) %>%
      filter(plus_minus == "+") -> go_select_data
    go_select_data %>%
      group_by(type) %>%
      slice_max(log_fdr, n = 30) %>%
      ungroup() %>%
      dplyr::select(term.id) %>%
      distinct -> selected_term_id
    go_select_data %>%
      inner_join(selected_term_id, by = "term.id") %>%
      ggplot(aes(x = reorder(GO_short, log_fdr), y = log_fdr,
                 fill = type, label = number_in_list)) +
      geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
      theme_bw() +
      facet_grid(type ~ .) +
      scale_fill_manual(values = labelcolors) +
      theme(axis.text.x =
              element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5)) -> p1
    
    width_num <- dim(selected_term_id)
    go_select_data %>%
      dplyr::select(type) %>%
      distinct %>%
      dim -> height_num
    paste("Hs_", input, "_", cluster_id, "_go_term.png", sep = "") %>%
            paste(curdir, input, output_directory, ., sep = "/") %>%
      ggsave(p1, width = 2 + width_num[1] * 0.2, height = 4 + 2 * height_num[1], limitsize = FALSE)
  }
}
```

```{r}
output_count <- tibble()
for(input in well_integrated){
  print(input)
  hs_marker %>%
      filter(organ == input) %>%
      dplyr::select(cluster) %>%
      distinct() %>%
      unlist -> Hs_all
  for(cluster_id in Hs_all){
    go_result_table %>%
      mutate(cluster = factor(cluster)) %>%
      inner_join(cell_type_ontology, by = c("organ", "cluster")) %>%
      filter(background == "all" & organ == input & cluster == cluster_id) %>%
      mutate(log_fdr = -log10(fdr)) %>%
      mutate(GO_short = cut_GO_short(term.id, term.label, 40)) %>%
      dplyr::select(term.id, term.label, type) %>%
      distinct -> go_select_data

    go_select_data %>%
      filter(type == "ccs_hs_only") -> css_hs_only
    go_select_data %>%
      filter(type == "ccs_ss") -> css_ss
    go_select_data %>%
      filter(type == "ccs_shared") -> css_shared
    # css_hs_only かつ css_shared
    css_shared %>%
      inner_join(css_hs_only, by = c("term.id", "term.label")) %>%
      dim -> css_shared_hs_only
    # css_hs_onlyにあるがccs_sharedにない
    css_shared %>%
      anti_join(css_hs_only, ., by = c("term.id", "term.label")) %>%
      dim -> css_hs_only_not_shared
    # ccs_sharedにあるがccs_hs_onlyにない
    css_shared %>%
      anti_join(css_hs_only, by = c("term.id", "term.label")) %>%
      dim -> css_shared_not_hs_only
    # ccs_sharedかつccs_ss
    css_shared %>%
      inner_join(css_ss, by = c("term.id", "term.label")) %>%
      dim -> css_shared_ss
    # css_ssにあるがccs_sharedにない
    css_shared %>%
      anti_join(css_ss, ., by = c("term.id", "term.label")) %>%
      dim -> css_ss_not_shared
    # ccs_sharedにあるがccs_ssにない
    css_shared %>%
      anti_join(css_ss, by = c("term.id", "term.label")) %>%
      dim -> css_shared_not_ss
    
    tibble(organ = input, cluster = cluster_id,
           css_shared_and_hsonly = css_shared_hs_only[1],
           css_hsonly_and_shared = css_shared_hs_only[1],
           css_hsonly_not_shared = css_hs_only_not_shared[1],
           css_shared_not_hsonly = css_shared_not_hs_only[1],
           css_shared_and_ss = css_shared_ss[1],
           css_ss_and_shared = css_shared_ss[1],
           css_ss_not_shared = css_ss_not_shared[1],
           css_shared_not_ss = css_shared_not_ss[1]) %>%
      bind_rows(output_count, .) -> output_count
  }
}
output_count %>%
    pivot_longer(-c(organ, cluster), names_to = "relation") %>%
    mutate(cluster=factor(as.character(cluster))) -> output_count_tidyr
```

```{r}
convert_type <- function(type){
        result <- c()
        for(target in type){
            if(target == "ccs"){
                result <- c(result, "ccs")
            }else if(target == "ccs_hs_only"){
                result <- c(result, "hsonly")
            }else if(target == "ccs_shared"){
                result <- c(result, "shared")
            }else if(target == "ccs_ss"){
                result <- c(result, "ss")
            }
        }
        return(result)
}

go_result_table %>%
    group_by(organ, cluster) %>%
    dplyr::count(type) %>%
    mutate(target = convert_type(type)) -> count_go

                 names_pattern = "css_(.*)_(.*)_(.*)") %>%
```
